attributes.action: Scrap the BBC licence fee for all and / or give the choice whether we want to watch BBC or not, just like SKY etc
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Scrap the BBC licence fee for all and / or give the choice whether we want to watch BBC or not, just like SKY etc.

Why should we pay automatically for something we don't even watch!

It's an age old tradition, archaeic and should be scrapped

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
